name: Baabara: The Game
description:
Baabara: The Game

This is our submission from the GJL Game Parade Spring 2021 Jam with the theme of "Strength lies in differences".

The game is a 3D platformer, where you play as either Baarbara or Woolimina (Baarbara's side-kick) the sheep. The goal is to switch your perspective between black and white (emphasising the importance in seeing things in different perspectives), revealing hidden platforms that lead you to the goal.

Controls:

Move Left: A

Move Right: D

Jump: SPACE

Switch View: TAB

Enter Exit: W

Programming Credits:

Alex  Ovcinikov

Ian Barrow

Lizzie Briggs

Modelling and Animation Credits:

Dave Newman
